sakai:query-template: /jcr:root/{_connectionstore}//*[@sling:resourceType='sakai/contact' and jcr:contains(@sakai:state,'{state|ACCEPTED}') and @sakai:state!="NONE"]/jcr:deref(@jcr:reference, '*')[(jcr:contains(., '{q|*}') or jcr:contains(*/*/*,'{q|*}'))] order by @{sortOn|jcr:score} {sortOrder|descending}
sakai:title: Contacts - Search.
sakai:shortDescription: Search trough contacts based on firstName, lastName or email.  You can also specify contact state: ie ACCEPTED, BLOCKED, IGNORED, INVITED, PENDING, REJECTED, ect.  The default search value is ACCEPTED.  To search all contacts do: q=*&state=*
sakai:parameters: {"name" : "q", "description" : "Filter for the firstName, lastName or email."}
{"name" : "state", "description" : "Filter for the state of a contact: ie ACCEPTED, BLOCKED, IGNORED, INVITED, PENDING, REJECTED, ect.  The default state is ACCEPTED"}
sakai:description: Search trough contacts based on firstName, lastName or email.  You can also specify contact state: ie ACCEPTED, BLOCKED, IGNORED, INVITED, PENDING, REJECTED, ect.  The default search value is ACCEPTED.  To search all contacts do: q=*&state=*
